texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: IRC is my main communication mechanism and I've gradually moved from graphical clients, to  irssi  and then to  weechat . Text-based IRC removes quite a few distractions for me and it allows me to get access to my IRC communications from anything that can act as an ssh client.
texts.text: IRC is my main communication mechanism and I've gradually moved from graphical clients, to  irssi  and then to  weechat . Text-based IRC removes quite a few distractions for me and it allows me to get access to my IRC communications from anything that can act as an ssh client.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I wanted a better way to get notifications when people send me messages and I'm away from my desk.  Pushover  is a great service that will take notification data via an API and blast it out to various devices. Once you configure your account, just install the mobile application on your device and you're ready to go.
texts.text: I wanted a better way to get notifications when people send me messages and I'm away from my desk.  Pushover  is a great service that will take notification data via an API and blast it out to various devices. Once you configure your account, just install the mobile application on your device and you're ready to go.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Connecting weechat to Pushover is quite easy thanks to the  pushover.pl  script. Go into your main weechat console (usually by pressing META/ALT/OPTION-1 on your keyboard) and install it:
texts.text: Connecting weechat to Pushover is quite easy thanks to the  pushover.pl  script. Go into your main weechat console (usually by pressing META/ALT/OPTION-1 on your keyboard) and install it:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: There are quite a few variables to configure. You can get a list of them by typing:
texts.text: There are quite a few variables to configure. You can get a list of them by typing:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You'll need two pieces of information to configure the plugin:
texts.text: You'll need two pieces of information to configure the plugin:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Now you're ready to configure the plugin:
texts.text: Now you're ready to configure the plugin:

texts.label: code
texts.orig:
/set plugins.var.perl.pushover.token [YOUR PUSHOVER APPLICATION TOKEN]
/set plugins.var.perl.pushover.user [YOUR USER KEY]
/set plugins.var.perl.pushover.enabled on
texts.text:
/set plugins.var.perl.pushover.token [YOUR PUSHOVER APPLICATION TOKEN]
/set plugins.var.perl.pushover.user [YOUR USER KEY]
/set plugins.var.perl.pushover.enabled on

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You can test it out quickly by using  Freenode's web chat  to send yourself a private message from another account.
texts.text: You can test it out quickly by using  Freenode's web chat  to send yourself a private message from another account.
